detailsData.title: 24/7 Availability
detailsData.content: Accidents are unexpected and can happen at any time. This is why we believe that getting the help you need should never be an obstacle. Our team is available around-the-clock, every day of the year.

detailsData.title: No Recovery, No Fee
detailsData.content: Being involved in an accident can be traumatic and result in unexpected expenses. That is why we operate on a contingency fee basis. If we don’t win your case, you don’t pay us anything.

detailsData.title: Record Verdicts
detailsData.content: Just last year, we secured our client a $48 Million Dollar Award for his work-related accident. This was the largest recovery amount for any construction case in the State of New York that year.

detailsData.title: Legal Pioneers
detailsData.content: Our firm was able to change the law for the entire state of New York in the landmark case Wilinski v. 334 E. 92nd Hous. Dev Fund. Corp., offering greater protections to workers injured by falling objects at the jobsite.

valueProp: Our team of New York City injury lawyers understands the trauma and difficulty an accident brings upon someone. This includes serious life-altering injuries, unexpected bills, property damage, and overall pain and suffering. That’s why our highest priority is to secure the maximum compensation for our clients. From motor vehicle to construction, there are thousands of accidents that occur in the city every year, and we’re familiar with every single type. Our combined 130-plus years of experience has enabled us to achieve an extraordinary success rate, with an impressive amount of winning multi-million-dollar verdicts.

testimonalData.text: I was wrongly hit by a truck and was in a lot of pain after the accident. It wasn’t until I retained this law firm that things started to look up. So many kind paralegals that scheduled my appointments and the lawyers are the best. Thanks for everything!

testimonalData.text: Two of my friends got excellent recoveries from their accidents, one car accident and the other was in construction. This is a top tier firm. Lawyers have an excellent ability to study a case and truly go above and beyond.

testimonalData.text: I was hit by a 300 pound electrical box on my construction site doing demolition. Worst accident of my life, I was severely injured almost everywhere. Thanks to this law firm, I got my life back and received a very good recovery. My family and I are relieved and grateful.
